feature.name: api-base-url-config
feature.title: Make API Client Base URL Configurable via apiConfig
feature.description: Create a centralized API configuration class similar to authConfig.ts for managing the backend API base URL across different environments

complexity.reasoning: Atomic task creating a single configuration file following an existing pattern (authConfig.ts). No architectural changes, no external dependencies. Single developer can complete in <1 hour.

changes: Create src/config/apiConfig.ts with ApiConfig interface and factory functions
Update src/config/env.ts to export apiConfig instead of raw baseUrl
Update apiClient.ts to use apiConfig factory function
